base_name: Prime Jumbo Released ARMs Product Overlays
extracted_text: 11/18/25, 12:00 PM Prime Jumbo Released ARMs Product Overlays Prime Jumbo Released ARMs Product Overlays BORROWER GUIDELINE OVERLAY Only borrowers with a valid social security number are Eligible Borrowers allowed. Feedback Maximum Borrowers There can be no more than four borrowers per loan. UWM will service a maximum of ten loans per borrower at Maximum Loans any one point in time. ELIGIBILITY GUIDELINE OVERLAY AUS Feedback This product can be run through DU or LPA. This product will have DU or LPA Approve/Ineligible or Accept/Ineligible feedback. The only reasons allowed for ineligible feedback are the loan amount and LTV for cash-out refinances over 80%. https://thesource.uwm.com/search-guidelines/uwm-documents/underwriting/primejumboreleasedarmsproductoverlaysund 1/6 11/18/25, 12:00 PM Prime Jumbo Released ARMs Product Overlays ELIGIBILITY GUIDELINE OVERLAY A-Caution, Incomplete, Invalid, or Out of Scope are not allowed. No manual underwriting. Texas 50(a)(6) and Conversion Loans Texas 50(a)(6) loans are not eligible. If an existing first mortgage is being paid off through the transaction, it must be seasoned at least 6 months of the refinance, as measured by the note date of the existing loan to Cash-Out Refinance Mortgage Seasoning the note date of the new loan. This does not apply to existing subordinate liens against the subject property, nor does it apply when a borrower is buying out a co-owner pursuant to a legal agreement. Feedback In addition to purposes permitted by Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac guidelines, proceeds from a rate and term refinance may be used to pay off subordinate mortgage liens that have been seasoned for at least one year. The seasoning requirement for Rate and Term Refinance a junior lien that is a HELOC will be applied to the date of the most recent draw against the equity line unless the draws were less than $2,000 and provided that the total draws have not exceeded a total of $2,000 in the last twelve months. CREDIT OVERLAY DTI Cannot exceed 50%. https://thesource.uwm.com/search-guidelines/uwm-documents/underwriting/primejumboreleasedarmsproductoverlaysund 2/6 11/18/25, 12:00 PM Prime Jumbo Released ARMs Product Overlays CREDIT OVERLAY Using extenuating circumstances to reduce waiting period Extenuating Circumstances requirements is not allowed (for Foreclosure, Bankruptcy, Deed-in-Lieu, Pre-Foreclosure/Short Sale). No late payments are allowed for any mortgage in the 12 Mortgage History months prior to loan closing unless during a COVID-19 forbearance. INCOME/EMPLOYMENT OVERLAY Tax returns or 1099s cannot be used as standalone Social Security Income documentation. Award letter or proof of current receipt is required. Feedback Alimony/Child Support Income Evidence of 6 months receipt required. A VOE is not acceptable as standalone documentation, VOEs unless ordered by UWM. A paystub or the equivalent is otherwise required. Assets as Income Assets as income is not allowed on this product type. RSU Income/Employer Stock Options are eligible to use towards qualifying income. Documentation RSU Income/Stock Options requirements would follow the most recent version of the Fannie Mae or Freddie Mac selling guide, as determined by AUS. Mortgage Credit Certificates Mortgage credit certificates are not permitted. https://thesource.uwm.com/search-guidelines/uwm-documents/underwriting/primejumboreleasedarmsproductoverlaysund 3/6 11/18/25, 12:00 PM Prime Jumbo Released ARMs Product Overlays PROPERTY GUIDELINE OVERLAY On a cash-out of an investment property, a fully executed letter of explanation from the borrower indicating the loan Cash-Out Attestation (Investment Property ONLY) proceeds will be used for the acquisition, improvement, or maintenance of a rental property is required. Cash-out proceeds cannot be used for any personal use. Co-ops, Leasehold Properties, Manufactured Homes, Ineligible Properties Agricultural Properties, Log Homes New attached projects in Florida must be on FNMA approved Florida Attached Condos list. Refinance of Listed Properties Must remove listing prior to clear to close. HPML HPML loans are not permitted. Feedback Appraisal Appraisal Waivers are not acceptable. All files must have a full appraisal. Refinance transactions with loan amounts greater than $2 million and above require a second appraisal and must be completed by a different appraiser. Appraised value will be the lower of the two appraisals. A secondary valuation is required on all loans. This valuation cannot be more than 10% less than the appraisal. Acceptable options include: An acceptable CU/LCA score (completed by UWM) A UWM obtained AVM A collateral desktop analysis (CDA) https://thesource.uwm.com/search-guidelines/uwm-documents/underwriting/primejumboreleasedarmsproductoverlaysund 4/6 11/18/25, 12:00 PM Prime Jumbo Released ARMs Product Overlays PROPERTY GUIDELINE OVERLAY An exterior-only appraisal A field review A second full appraisal Appraisals transferred from another lender to UWM are permitted if a transfer letter is obtained; the AMC’s AIR policy, E&O insurance, and QC plan are adequate, and the appraisal is found acceptable without revisions. Investor guidelines require the dwelling coverage to cover the replacement cost, if the replacement cost is less than the loan amount. If the replacement cost is more than the loan Homeowner’s Insurance Coverage - Replacement Cost amount, the dwelling coverage must cover the greater of 80% of the replacement cost or the loan amount. Full replacement Feedback cost, guaranteed replacement cost, or 100% replacement cost verbiage is not acceptable. Escrow Holdbacks Not permitted. ASSETS GUIDELINE OVERLAY Loan amounts above $2 million required 18 months of Reserves subject PITI(a) in reserves. DATE UPDATED: 10/23/2025 PROPRIETARY AND CONFIDENTIAL TO UWM - FOR USE BY UWM APPROVED PARTIES ONLY.
